original_text: Against him came up Shalmaneser king of Assyria. And Hoshea became his vassal and paid him tribute.
korean_text: 앗수르의 왕 살만에셀이 올라오니 호세아가 그에게 종이 되어 조공을 드리더니

sentences.original_text: Against him came up Shalmaneser king of Assyria.
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 왕 살만에셀이 그를 대적하여 올라왔습니다.
